issue.title: building from source error in under Ubuntu 12.04

content.raw:
yes, both were installed

`$ dpkg -l | grep libplayer` returns:

```
ii  libplayerc++3.0                            3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - C++ client library
ii  libplayerc++3.0-dev                        3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - C++ client library development files
ii  libplayerc3.0                              3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - C client library
ii  libplayerc3.0-dev                          3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - C client library development files
ii  libplayercommon3.0                         3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - common functions
ii  libplayercommon3.0-dev                     3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - error handling development files
ii  libplayercore3.0                           3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - core library
ii  libplayercore3.0-dev                       3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - core library development files
ii  libplayerdrivers3.0                        3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - hardware drivers library
ii  libplayerinterface3.0                      3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - interface library
ii  libplayerinterface3.0-dev                  3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - interface library dev files
ii  libplayerjpeg3.0                           3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - jpeg library
ii  libplayertcp3.0                            3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - tcp library
ii  libplayerwkb3.0                            3.0.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3                        amd64        Networked server for robots and sensors - WKB library

```
